DOC.brief_summary: This is a prospective study that will examine psychosocial improvements among CF adolescents and caregivers going through the Stress Management and Resiliency Training - Relaxation Response Resiliency Program (SMART-3RP).
DOC.brief_title: Resiliency Training for Adolescents With Craniofacial Conditions and Their Caregivers
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria for Adolescent Patients: 1. Adolescents aged 14 to 22 2. English fluency and literacy 3. Diagnosis of a craniofacial condition by self report Inclusion Criteria for Parents or Other Caregivers: 1. Must be 18 years of age and older 2. English fluency and literacy 3. Parent or caregiver of a child or young adult with a craniofacial condition 1. Unable to benefit from the program due to cognitive, psychiatric or other reasons based on the opinion of the group leader 2. Unable or unwilling to sign the informed consent documents
